sentences.en: a diplomat who had earned his spurs as the prime minister's personal assistant.
sentences.cn: 外交家经过奋斗获得首相私人助理之职

sentences.en: Chris will pay – he’s earning a fortune.
sentences.cn: 克里斯会付款的，他在挣大钱。

sentences.en: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.cn: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.en: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.cn: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.en: I earn enough to push the boat out now and again.
sentences.cn: 我挣的钱足以时不时摆摆阔了。

sentences.en: I make it no secret that our worst consultants earn nothing.
sentences.cn: 我可以坦白地说，我们最差的顾问挣不到一分钱。

sentences.en: I was old enough to work and earn money.
sentences.cn: 我已经长大了，可以工作赚钱了。

sentences.en: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.cn: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.en: If you grant my request, you will earn my thanks.
sentences.cn: 如果你答应我的要求, 就会得到我的感谢.

sentences.en: Nowadays it is very easy to earn a living.
sentences.cn: 现今谋生很容易.

sentences.en: Players should be allowed to earn money from advertising.
sentences.cn: 应该允许运动员拍广告挣钱。

sentences.en: Ray will earn his keep on local farms while studying.
sentences.cn: 雷求学期间会在当地的农场干活赚取生活费。

sentences.en: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.cn: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.en: The dancers can earn anything between £20 and £30 for each session.
sentences.cn: 这些舞蹈演员每场演出的收入在20至30英镑之间。

sentences.en: The most they earn in a day is ten roubles.
sentences.cn: 他们每天最多挣10卢布。

sentences.en: The movie earned £7 million on its first day.
sentences.cn: 这部电影上映首日便大赚700万英镑。

sentences.en: They earn their living by squatting the land and sharecropping.
sentences.cn: 他们靠擅自占用土地，按种地的收益分成为生。

sentences.en: To earn foreign exchange we must export.
sentences.cn: 要想获得外汇，我们必须出口。

sentences.en: Unskilled workers usually earn less money than skilled workers.
sentences.cn: 无技能的工人通常比有技能的工人挣钱少.

sentences.en: What a lovely way to earn a living.
sentences.cn: 谋生妙道啊！

sentences.en: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

sentences.en: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.cn: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.en: Young conductors earn their spurs in a small orchestra or opera house.
sentences.cn: 年轻的指挥家们在小乐队或小歌剧院里崭露头角。

sentences.en: Your education will equip you to earn a good living.
sentences.cn: 你所受的教育会使你过上富裕的生活.

phrases.tran_cn: 努力挣得，出名：经常是在面临困难的情况下，某人通过努力工作和经验的积累而获得的一定职位
(英，非正式)凭实力获得应得的酬劳

trans.tran_en: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do
to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do
